mapper.sql: id, bp_name, bp_deviceID, device_from, bp_measuretime, bp_sbp, bp_dbp, bp_pulse, bp_mp, bp_status, data_from_type, patient_phone, device_from_type, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select:
select
from patient_blood_pressure_auto where (bp_deviceID = #{bp_deviceID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (device_from_type=1 or device_from_type is null))
or (bp_deviceID = #{bp_deviceID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and device_from_type=2 and patient_phone=#{patientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
order by createtime desc

SELECT
from patient_blood_pressure_auto where patient_phone = #{patientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and '${startTime}' <= bp_measuretime and bp_measuretime < '${endTime}' order by bp_measuretime

SELECT round(avg(bp_sbp)) bp_sbp, round(avg(bp_dbp)) bp_dbp, round(avg(bp_pulse)) bp_pulse, patient_phone, DATE_FORMAT(bp_measuretime,'%Y-%m-%d') bp_measuretime2 from patient_blood_pressure_auto where patient_phone = #{patientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and '${startTime}' <= bp_measuretime and bp_measuretime <= '${endTime}' group by patient_phone, bp_measuretime2

select
from patient_blood_pressure_auto where 1=1
and patient_phone = #{patientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by bp_measuretime desc
select max(bp_measuretime) bp_measuretime from patient_blood_pressure_auto where bp_deviceID = #{bp_deviceID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (device_from_type=1 or device_from_type is null)
